TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DragFailedHandler(object o, DragFailedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed DragFailedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the DragFailedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the DragFailedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the DragFailedHandler is removed from the event.
